ComicInfo.Summary:
Amanda has survived the psychopath Harold Lorre, multiple crossed tribes, and the slaughter of countless friends, but the evangelical Crossed may finally seal her fate. DAVID LAPHAM brings Amanda's tale to a startling conclusion that will leave fans stunned and scarred.
Available with a Regular cover by Jacen Burrows, Wraparound cover by Gabriel Andrade, Torture cover by Matt Martin, and a special Red Crossed Incentive also by Burrows.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/crossed-badlands-36/4000-426916/
